net.padlocksoftware.padlock
Class KeyManager

java.lang.Object
  net.padlocksoftware.padlock.KeyManager

public final class KeyManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods for DSA KeyPair generation plus file and stream I/O.

Author:
Jason Nichols (jason@padlocksoftware.net)

Constructor Summary

          Export the supplied Keypair to an output Stream.

          Import a Padlock 2.x (DSA based) KeyPair from a file.

Constructor Detail

KeyManager

public KeyManager()
Method Detail

createKeyPair

public static java.security.KeyPair createKeyPair()
Create a 1024 bit DSA KeyPair.

Returns:
A newly created DSA KeyPair.

exportKeyPair

public static void exportKeyPair(java.security.KeyPair pair,
                                 java.io.OutputStream stream)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Export the supplied Keypair to an output Stream.

Parameters:
pair - The KeyPair to export. KeyPairs should only be pairs created with the createKeyPair(int) method.
stream - The stream to write the KeyPair to. Key streams contain both the public and private keys and should be secured.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - For any Stream IO related exceptions
java.lang.NullPointerException - If either parameter is null
Since:
2.0

exportKeyPair

public static void exportKeyPair(java.security.KeyPair pair,
                                 java.io.File file)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Export the supplied Keypair to an output File.

Parameters:
pair - The KeyPair to export. KeyPairs should only be pairs created with the createKeyPair(int) method.
file - The file to save the KeyPair to. Key files contain both the public and private keys and should be secured.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - For any File IO related exceptions
java.lang.NullPointerException - If either parameter is null

importKeyPair

public static java.security.KeyPair importKeyPair(java.io.InputStream stream)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Import a Padlock 2.x (DSA based) KeyPair from an InputStream. The stream is assumed to have been previously exported in a supported format using the exportKeyPair methods.

Parameters:
stream - The KeyPair stream to import.
Returns:
The DSA KeyPair contained in the specified file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If file is missing or contain invalid data.
Since:
2.0

importKeyPair

public static java.security.KeyPair importKeyPair(java.io.File file)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Import a Padlock 2.x (DSA based) KeyPair from a file. The file is assumed to have been previously exported in a supported format using the exportKeyPair(KeyPair, File) method.

Parameters:
file - The DSA KeyPair file to import.
Returns:
The KeyPair contained in the specified file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If file is missing or contain invalid data.
